title: New: The Beach – Thieves
content:
With a decent chunk of Radio 1 play already for debut single, Thieves, it’s fair to say that the positioning of RCA signed The Beach is perhaps not towards music blogs.

That said, there’s easily enough crossover potential in Thieves to wow the Hype Machine, whilst also appealing to a wider ‘mainstream’ audience. So the whole ‘not attaching identities’ game is a little played out, and actually almost detracts from the song itself; music this powerful doesn’t need worn out marketing gimmicks. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
